name: Short On Time
description:
ESCAPE BEFORE THE ZOMBIE HORDE OVERWHELMS YOU

---------CONTROLS---------

W,A,S,D Movement
L. Shift Sprint
L. Click Fire Weapon
R. Click Melee Attack

----------ABOUT-----------
This game was created and as a submission for the Godot Wild Jam #16 "Short On Time"

Sticking with the theme "Short on Time", I spent over half of the Jam's allotted time reading up on Godot and tinkering around in the engine and only starting a project for the jam when I had 4 days to complete and submit my creation. 

I was unable to implement everything I wanted within my time restraints but I believe that I have made a fun little game. 

Please let me know your thoughts. 

Made with Godot
https://godotengine.org/
